document.discussion_title: Rolex Explorer Black Arab 3-6-9 - 214270 for sale price on request
document.topic_text: Pictures are from the actual watch we have for sale. - All watches with exceeded factory warranty are delivered with a 12-month warranty. - Pre-owned watches are systematically checked by experienced and certified watchmakers and serviced if needed. - All watches sold by us are in perfect or near-perfect condition. - All watches presented here can be seen & picked up in our highly secured showroom in Rotterdam at your convenience. - Opening hours are from Mon-Fri 10.00 – 17.00h. Please make an appointment prior to your arrival. - Our staff handling watches is highly experienced and experts in their field. (Combined more then 30 years of experience working with O.A. Rolex , Cartier, IWC & Breitling as watchmaker& sales representative). - All parcels shipped from and to us* are constantly fully insured by Amlin Europe. Our parcel packaging is professional, discreet & suited for shipping valuables. - Payment on online orders is by bank-wire only. In our showroom payment can be made in Cash, Credit card & Debit card. If you have any other questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. Team 10PAST10 *Notice: Shipment from customers to our company is only covered by our insurance policy after our approval and receiving a shipping label from us! You may also be interested in these watches from 10PAST10.COM
